mapper.update:
update trans
block_id = #{blockId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
txHash = #{txhash,jdbcType=CHAR},
amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
total_input = #{totalInput,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
total_output = #{totalOutput,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
time = #{time,jdbcType=BIGINT},
confirmations = #{confirmations,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
weight = #{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fee = #{fee,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
fee_per_weight = #{feePerWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
fee_per_byte = #{feePerByte,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
sizeOndisk = #{sizeondisk,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where transId = #{transid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update trans set block_id = #{blockId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, txHash = #{txhash,jdbcType=CHAR}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, total_input = #{totalInput,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, total_output = #{totalOutput,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, time = #{time,jdbcType=BIGINT}, confirmations = #{confirmations,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, weight = #{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fee = #{fee,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, fee_per_weight = #{feePerWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, fee_per_byte = #{feePerByte,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, sizeOndisk = #{sizeondisk,jdbcType=INTEGER} where transId = #{transid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
